page.title: 10Newquay's Services
page.content:
Newquay hospital can take about 23 patients.There are about 40 members of staff,including nursing staff,doctors, porters,cooks and cleaners.Meals are at 7.45 a.m.,11.45 a.m. and 5.45 p.m., with a milk drink at 8 p.m.There is a male ward and a female ward with ten beds in each.There are also three side wards and a treatment room where medicines are kept.
The fire station has 5 appliances and a Land Rover which is used for cliff rescues.There are about 250 fires a year and about 10 cliff rescues,mainly in the summer.Many fires are chimney fires.
Newquay Tretherras School is a Comprehensive taking pupils from age 11 to age 18.
